page.title: 07HOUSING 4
page.content: The advert for the new development at the Old Orchard site reads like this: 'Robert Hitchins, builders are pleased to introduce an exclusive new development of just 10 country properties combining the style & comfort of a brand new home with delights of life in the Cotswolds. These 3 & 4 bed. houses are all built from natural Cotswold stone, all have garages, double glazing, full central heating & a wealth of luxurious features inside to make life trouble free. Located in the heart of Longborough, one of Glos's most traditional & unspoilt villages Old Orchard Court is a perfect retreat for inter-city commuters to London & the Midlands. Prices from Â£59 950 for 3 bed. Redwood & Â£78 950 for 4 bed. Hartford.'
